name: WisdomTree, Inc.
description: WisdomTree, Inc. is an innovative asset management firm headquartered in New York City that specializes in exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and asset management strategies. Founded in 2006, WisdomTree has established itself as a leader in the ETF space, offering a diverse range of products aimed at providing investors with efficient, low-cost access to various asset classes. The company's investment philosophy is centered around the belief that fundamentally weighted strategies can enhance investment performance compared to traditional market capitalization-weighted approaches. WisdomTree's product lineup includes equity, fixed income, and commodity ETFs, with a particular emphasis on international equities and alternative investments. The firm is also recognized for its focus on dividend growth strategies and has been a pioneer in the development of currency-hedged equity ETFs. WisdomTree's commitment to transparency and investor education is evident in its ongoing efforts to provide market insights and research to help investors make informed decisions. With a robust distribution network and a strong suite of investment products, WisdomTree continues to evolve and adapt to the changing landscape of the investment management industry.

products: WisdomTree U.S. Quality Dividend Growth Fund
WisdomTree Emerging Markets Quality Dividend Growth Fund
WisdomTree Negative Duration U.S. Treasury Fund

faq.answer: WisdomTree is known for its innovative exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and investment strategies.

faq.answer: Jonathan Steinberg is the CEO of WisdomTree, Inc.

faq.answer: WisdomTree is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.answer: WisdomTree offers a variety of ETFs including equity, fixed income, and commodity products.
